subject: Suits and Litigation
Basketball
Madison Square Garden
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan refused to do the compassionate and corporately prudent thing by settling Anucha Browne Sanders’s case before it ever went to trial.
snippet: James L. Dolan refused to do the compassionate and corporately prudent thing by settling Anucha Browne Sanders’s case before it ever went to trial.
